channel.description: Recent content in hiking on Pauline Lallinec's personal website

item.title: I climbed the Kilimanjaro!
item.description: Directly after the Helm Summit 2019, I left Amsterdam to go directly to Tanzania and face another kind of summit - that is, Uhuru Peak, summit of the Kilimanjaro.
